title: A copy of a paper sent to John Otway, Justice of the Peace, concerning swearing
author: Howgill, Francis, 1618-1669.
notes: This item appears at reel 591:14 bound following Wing C1514, "A journal of the life of ... Will. Caton," and at reel 2209:8.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Earlham Collge Library.
